EmailTemplate.subject: NCS - update on {!Contact.FirstName}’s application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
{!Contact.FirstName} is on the waiting list for NCS
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
Thank you for {!Contact.FirstName}’s application for NCS. NCS is a popular programme and {!Contact.FirstName} is on the waiting list at the moment. However, they still have a good chance of getting a place.
What are your next steps? To increase {!Contact.FirstName}’s chances, please pay now and we will be able to proceed more quickly if a place comes up. Thanks to Government backing, all you need to pay is a {!Contact.Amount_due_outstanding__c} admin fee{!IF(Contact.Days_until_discount_deadline__c >1," if you pay before "&TEXT(DAY(Contact.School_s_discount_deadline__c))&"/"& TEXT(MONTH(Contact.School_s_discount_deadline__c))&"/"&(TEXT(YEAR(Contact.School_s_discount_deadline__c)))&", or up to £50 after this date","")}. To pay, log in here and go to the payment section, or call us to pay over the phone or arrange sending a cheque.
We wouldn’t want the cost to stop {!Contact.FirstName} taking part - just tick the option for financial support when you log in online or contact us on 020 3542 2400 or contact@ncsthechallenge.org.
You can also log in to select other suitable programme dates. The more dates you add, the greater {!Contact.FirstName}’s chances of taking part in NCS. You can also tick a box in the date selection if you are happy for {!Contact.FirstName} to travel to a programme which is further away and may have places available.
When will you find out more? We will call you if a place becomes available. This can be at any time, right up to the programme start date.
We hope to be able to offer {!Contact.FirstName} a place soon!
The NCS Team - The Challenge
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
